title: Aspects of behaviour (TEFC)
creator_contributor_role: Communication Research Media Productions, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Psychology
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Social psychology
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social psychology
description: Episode of Series "Psychology Today". Relating psychology to the student's life experience this film considers ethical issues such as obedience and authority along with prejudice and attitude change. It also examines questions like: what does a social psychologist do? How does physiology relate to behaviour? Do psychologists often agree? What is cultural psychology?
